name: Morocco
description: This trip was a birthday present to my father where we traveled to Africa

name: Scotland-Ireland
description: On this European journey we will visit the traditional Highland Games, search for the Loch Ness monster, taste whisky at the smallest distillery Edradour in Scotland and visit the historic Edinburgh Castle. The journey will continue to Belfast, Ireland the country where you will experience beautiful scenery, live music, city life, beer and more whisky. Apart from Belfast we will also visit Galway and finish the trip in Dublin.
